title: Kadhallikkum Aasai Illai Lyrics Chellamae
stanzas:
Kadhallikkum Aasai Illai Song Lyrics From Chellamae
#HarrishJayaraj #KayKay #Mahathi

Kadhallikkum aasai illai
kangal unnai kaanum varai
ullukkul kadhal
poothadhu unnaal

pattinathaar paadal mattum
paadam seidhu oppithaen
kannae naan unnai
kaanum munnaal

en aasai moongil
vedikka vaithaai
enn aanmai enakke
vilanga vaithaai

naa thottukolla
kitta vandhaal
thitti thitti
thiththithaai.

Kadhallikkum aasai illai
kangal unnai kaanum varai
ullukkul kadhal
poothadhu unnaal

pattinathaar paadal mattum
paadam seidhu oppithaen
kannae naan unnai
kaanum munnaal

sandhira sooriyar
ezhugayile unmuga
jaadaigal therigiradhe

boomiyil nilavu
varigayile azhagiya
koondhal sarigiradhe

sarigiradhe.....
virigiradhe.. hey hey hey..

vinnum mannum
unakkulla vilambaramo
ne vellichathil
seidhu vaitha
uli sirppamo..

manamadha motto
naan varudum kaattro
manamadha motto
naan varudum kaattro

Kadhallikkum aasai illai
kangal unnai kaanum varai
ullukkul kadhal
poothadhu unnaal

pattinathaar paadal mattum
paadam seidhu oppithaen
kannae naan unnai
kaanum munnaal

unmuga konda
paruvinilum
vinmeen oligal
veesudhadi

kobam vazhiyum
velaiyilum idhayam
kannil minnudhadi

minnudhadi..
enai kolludhadii..

engae nindru kaanum
podhum vaanam ondruthaan
unai endhap pakkam
paarkum podhum
penmai nandruthaan

uyir vidum munne
enai kadhali penne
uyir vidum munne
enai kadhali penne

kadhalikkum aasai illai
kadavul vandhu
sonnaalum
yemaandha pennai
thaedi poyaa

un sattaiyodu
otti kollum
pattai roja
naanallaa.

mullodu thaenumillai
poyaa.

oru kadhal enakul
pirakka villai
unai yaeno enakke
pudikka villai

nee kallai kanda
kaniyo indru
kadhal seivadhu
veenvelai.
